name: text-fillin
title: Text Fillin
description: Type text in Raycast and paste it into the previously focused app.
author: wadap

commands.name: text-fillin
commands.title: Text Fillin
commands.description: Open a temporary editor and fill text into the last focused app.

commands.name: text-fillin-history
commands.title: Text Fillin History
commands.description: Browse, paste, and manage previously submitted text.

scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../text-fillin-dist.zip . -x '*.DS_Store'
